title: Primož Roglič Joins Bora-Hansgrohe in Blockbuster Deal to Target Tour De France
content:
The Slovenian superstar will have a free run at Tour de France leadership after exiting contract with Jumbo-Visma among merger turmoil.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Joins Bora-Hansgrohe in Blockbuster Deal to Target Tour De France on Velo.
author: ahood
